description: Plugable's USB 2.0 media card reader is compact for easy portability, with a flexible USB cord to enable connections in tight spots next to larger USB plugs. The Plugable USB2-CARDRAM3 is a great option for anyone looking for an easy way add support for the most common storage media types used in common digital cameras, MP3 players, and mobile phones.Compatible card typesSD, SDHC, Mini SD, Micro SD (Trans-Flash), MS, MS Pro, MS Duo, MS Pro Duo, HS MS, MMC, RSMMCOperating Systems supportedDriverless compatibility with modern USB 3.0, 2.0, and 1.1 capable systems including Windows, Mac OS X, and Linux. Android compatibility varies by device and is limited to devices running 4.0 and later with a full-sized USB port for peripherals.
title: Plugable USB 2.0 Flash Memory Card Reader for Windows, Mac, Linux, and Certain Android Systems - Supports SD cards (SDHC, Mini SD, Micro SD / T-Flash, etc) and MS, MS Pro Duo, MMC, More
